description: React component implementing a to-do list application with local storage persistence, task filtering, editing, and accessibility features.

methods.name: safeJsonParse
methods.description: Parses JSON string safely, returns null on error.

methods.name: loadFromStorage
methods.description: Loads application state from local storage.

methods.name: saveToStorage
methods.description: Saves application state to local storage.

methods.name: generateId
methods.description: Generates a unique ID using crypto or fallback method.

methods.name: normalizeLoadedState
methods.description: Normalizes and validates loaded state from storage.

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Handles state transitions based on dispatched actions.

methods.name: getFilteredTodos
methods.description: Filters todos based on current filter.

methods.name: pluralize
methods.description: Returns singular or plural form based on count.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component for the to-do application.
